## EmbeddedSchemaFieldDefinition type

Represents an embedded schema field definition (in a Schema).

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type EmbeddedSchemaFieldDefinition = ItemFieldDefinition & {
    EmbeddedFields?: FieldsDefinitionDictionary;
    EmbeddedSchema?: Link;
};
```
